content.rendered:
Experience our

Banquets

Introduction of Banquet

The Kings Club Banquet features beautiful interiors and a delicious menu. Stunning outdoor garden with enough space to accommodate large gatherings offering an array of delicacies for events, our catering services provide delicious meals for any event can be tailored to suit its requirements.

Whether hosting a seminar, an exhibition, or a meeting, you will find your perfect venue here weddings and receptions.

Our elegant and high-class banquets offer extensive and flexible spaces to organize a variety of  functions and parties.  We have established our positive reputation based on our outstanding service, exemplary staff, and exclusive offers, which allows you to fully enjoy your events with no worries.

Indoor Party Hall

Our indoor party hall is ideal for birthday parties & other social get-togethers. This pace allows you to organize your events in a unique way and let your guests mesmerized with the decorations & food.

Outdoor Wedding Hall

Our outdoor wedding hall is very beautiful & fascinating with thousands of gorgeous flowers and lots of lush greenery. Extra decoration can also be arranged to customize the outdoor wedding hall to meet your exact requirements.

We Specialize in Intimate Catering
Think back to your last party. It was probably a
great time with amazing friends.

Wedding

Engagement

Birthdays

Corporate Events

Social Events

You can organize a wide variety of events, as well, which call for big celebrations. A few of the services offered at Kings Club Banquets include:

 
  • Birthday party
  • Anniversary celebrations
  • Social gatherings or events
  • Personal events or functions
  • Festivals or religious occasions
  • Meet ups
  • Conferences

Gallery

Birthday

Previous
Next

Marriage

Kings Club
Catering Service

King’s Club’s catering service provides a first-class gourmet  food experience to make your event an unforgettable one.  We serve Vegetarian dishes and  non-vegetarian dishes.  

Menu packages are available at affordable prices to fit varying budgets & groups of all sizes.  We can cater for everything from a small gathering to a large  gathering, from preparation to presentation, and from buffets to full formal sit-down meals.

 

We Provide

  • Vegetarian Food
  • Non Veg Food
  • Beverages
Get Started

Please wait while flipbook is loading. For more related info, FAQs and issues please refer to DearFlip WordPress Flipbook Plugin Help documentation.

Menu

Browse our traditional menus or let us create something new for you.

Vegetarian Food

Our menu features time honored favorites that have come to define the perfect Park City dining experience.

Non Veg Food

Our menu features time honored favorites that have come to define the perfect Park City dining experience.

Beverages

Our menu features time honored favorites that have come to define the perfect Park City dining experience.

Want to Purchase a Gift Certificate?

What’s the perfect way to tell someone that you care about them? Giving them a Gift Certificate! It’s a unique gift for loved ones and friends.

FAQ

1. Do Banquet Hall prices include decoration cost?
Yes.
2. What is the starting menu price/plate/buffet at Kings Club Banquet?
For More Details Call to Our Customer Executive
3. How soon should we book Banquet halls at Kings Club?
Whenever you wish
4. What are the facilities available in Kings Club Banquet Hall?
For More Details Call to Our Customer Executive

What Customers Are Saying About Us
We pride ourselves on what
our happy clients say.

I have celebrated my birthday at the Kings Club Banquet Hall, Indoor A/c Banquet for the this year! I have celebrated other family and friend functions at this location and my family only plans their events at Kings Club! Thank you for making our events so special. You food is great, your service is the best and your hall is beautiful!

Krishna Prasad

I had my engagement party at Kings Club and let me tell you everybody fell in love with the hall. The food was delicious, the service was outstanding, and the decor was so lush and elegant. People will not stop telling me how gorgeous everything was. Thank you Kings Club team for making my occasion so beautiful and fun!!!! I will definitely be having more parties here to come!!!

Mandeep & Vinutha

Being one of the first receptions in a brand new banquet hall, I had my reservations. Will it be ready in time, how will it look like, what would the food taste like. Needless to say that the night was perfect, the hall looks elegant and spectacular. The service was great and the food was awesome. Thanks for contributing to a very memorable night.

Shloka & Karan
